string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Circle of Trust 1 (The Unmarried Couple)
An unhappy couple in Amoria? I should go find out what's wrong...
I spoke with Gary and Shatima, and it looks like their rings were broken and taken in to #b20 Ring Fragments#k by some Tweeters. Looks like I'll have to clip some wings to find them all...
I returned to the Rings to Gary and Shatima, and now they can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!
Salutations, my friend. My name's Gary and this is my fiancée, Shatima. We wondered if you had a moment to maybe help us with getting our engagement rings back...

Great news. Well, we're schedules to get married, and I got Moony to give us a set of Golden Heart rings. Would you believe that the day after I propose, some Tweeters came along and dismantled both rings into fragments to put in their nest? Ridiculous. If you could hunt them down, I'm sure you'd come across the #b20 Ring Fragments#k. After that, Moony has agreed to restore the rings. If you could bring them back to us, we'd be grateful beyond words.
Oh...I see. Maybe we were mistaken about you. If you have a change of heart, please come back.
Simply Spectacular! Now we're off to get married. Thank you so much for your help!
My fiancée and I both thank you. Your kindness has touched both of our hearts.
Back already? That's gre-wait, wait...not all of them are here. When you have them all, be sure to head over to Moony.
